column5: Top Ten Reasons Why Men Prefer Guns Over Women     And here we go...   #10 - You can trade an old 44 for a new 22.  #9 - You can keep one gun at home and have another for when you're on the road.  #8 - If you admire a friend's gun and tell him so, he will probably let you try it out a few times.  #7 - Your primary gun doesn't mind if you keep another gun for a backup.  #6 - Your gun will stay with you even if you run out of ammo.  #5 - A gun doesn't take up a lot of closet space.  #4 - Guns function normally every day of the month.  #3 - A gun doesn't ask , "Do these new grips make me look fat?"  #2 - A gun doesn't mind if you go to sleep after you use it.  And the Number One reason  Why Men Prefer Guns over women.....     #1 - You can buy a silencer for a gun!
